We refer to Wikipedia articles on climbing for help. While discussing grip types, the speaker picks up a white hold with green dots, which is labeled as 'jugs'. This image is displayed on-screen during the speech.

Therefore, the answer is (A).

The audio description that matches the moment when the screen shows the category label for crimps and he sits cross-legged demonstrating holds is option A: He asks “What’s a crimp?” and contrasts crimps with pinches, describing an orange-and-black hold and a sharp green-and-pink hold by pad depth.
